-e ---

Usually easy Letter 𐍃⋍S⋍ST⋍ζ⋍δ (⋍TH/DH/DS rarely)

𐍃𐍅𐌹𐌽𐌸𐍃 ⋍ strength strondgs

𐍃 suffix ⇔ -cion -tion?

Soft S/G -us -isch -ig suffix:
𐌷𐌰𐌹𐌻𐍃 heilig / healed / healthy wealthy whole well 𓎟
𐌰𐍆𐌲𐌿𐌸𐍃 abguƌs off-guƒs abgöttig/abgöttisch
𐌰𐍆𐌷𐌰𐌹𐌼𐌴𐌹𐍃 abḫaιmeιs abheimig/abheimisch
𐌱𐌰𐌹𐍂𐌷𐍄𐍃 bright(ish/ig/y)
𐌲𐌰𐌽𐍉𐌷𐍃 genuḫs genug! enough (𐌷𐍃=g whichever provides it)

𐍅𐌹𐍃 weather

𐍄𐌰𐌹𐌺𐌽𐍃 tzaiknis Zeugnis, (be)Zeugung

-𐌽𐍃 -ness -nis -nig 𐍆𐌰𐍅𐌰𐌽𐍃 fewness wenig

But alternative reading: nasalization ζ⋍S⋍G⋍NG at the end of words

suffix -𐍃 like soft -G

𐌰𐌹𐌽𐍆𐌰𐌻𐌸𐍃 aιnfalƌs einfältig!

suffix -𐍃 acts like -N in German!

𐍅𐌴𐌹𐌽𐌰𐌲𐌰𐍂𐌳𐍃 weιnagards Weingarten vineyard

This could be a grammatical change along the wire OR the letter 𐍃 was 'SN' < 𓊃 SYN < Σ SUM

maybe later general german final nasalization though:
-𐌹𐌽𐍃 -ung -ing
-𐌻𐌴𐌹𐌽𐍃 -lung
-𐌽𐍉 -nung
-𐌽𐌹 -nung
-𐌴𐌹𐌽𐍃 -cion < -tion

𐍅𐌰𐌷𐍃𐍄𐌿𐍃 waḫstuns Wachstum

𐍅𐌴𐌹𐌽𐌰𐌱𐌰𐍃𐌹 weιnabasι vine/berry grape

𐌱𐌰𐍃𐌹 ⇔ Frucht ?
𐌱𐌰𐌿𐌸𐍃 taub | bauth blöd 'bot' ;) deaf,mute,flavorless,dull reverse

Orthographic Oddity: 𐌰𐍃𐍃 duplication seems to act like nasalizing ANS :
𐍆𐌰𐌿𐍂𐍃𐍄𐌰𐍃𐍃𐌴𐌹𐍃 verstasseιs fore-stasseιs VorStand
